title: DHS Karur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 87 Staff Nurse and Other Posts
description: The District Health Society Karur (DHS Karur) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 87 Staff Nurses, Lab Technicians, MMU Cleaner, Hospital Workers, Psychologists, Social Workers, Security, Radiographers, and Pharmacist Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their GNM, B.Sc Nursing, 08th, M.Sc, M.A., Diploma, B.Sc, and DMLT can apply for the DHS Ka...
